name: REWIND (itch) (Frick Ingredients)
description:
Game made for Weekly Game Jam 158.

Credits:

Discord - footmama1#1127

I did all the art, coding, and music. I found the sound effects online.


Plot:

You are a mutated cube that is stuck in a secret lab. You have the ability to freeze time and rewind it. 

The only thing is that when you rewind time, time freezes as well. Use this ability to your advantage as you try to escape the lab.

How To Play Controls:

Arrow Keys - Move around.

R - Rewind time.

Escape - Pause the game.

Goal:

To win the game, you need to beat all 15 levels. 

To open the door (The green portal) you need to stand on a pressure pad. But the only problem is when you step off of a pressure pad, the door closes. 

To fix this problem you can rewind time. When you rewind time, the pressure pad stays pressed and you can also collect keys when you are rewinding.

You need to rewind right into the door from the pressure pad to complete the level.

More Info:

Your levels save. So if you close the game, you will still be on the same level.

if you want, you can add me on discord. footmama1#1127. I am open for a partner for another jam.

I'm sorry that the music is kind of repetitive, I didn't have much time to work on it.

I'm also sorry about the horrible menu. Don't judge a book by it's cover :).
